resources.string: Send Files between Pc, Smartphone easily using Speed Ftp Server.

How to use-:


***Using WiFi***

1. Connect to WiFi.
 2. Turn on Ftp
 3. Connect other devices with wifi which your phone is connected.
 4. Open address in browser which shown in Ftp App or Use any ftp client app or software for PC and Smartphone
 5. Copy , Send Files.


*** Using WiFi Hotspot***

1. Create Hotspot
 2. Open Speed Ftp Server
 3. Turn on Ftp
 4. Connect devices to your WiFi hotspot
 5. Open address in browser which shown in Ftp App or Use any ftp client app or software for PC and Smartphone
 6. Copy , Send Files.

 ***How To Send Files To Phone***

1. Open MyComputer/This Pc/File Explorer in Windows Pc.
 2. Type the Address in Address Bar near the Search Option of Explorer
 3. Hit Enter
